B

bayes - package bayes
The package that offers an implementation of Dynamic Bayesian Networks.
BayesDyn - Class in bayes
Represents a Dynamic Bayesian Network (implements the BayesianNetwork interface) to be learned using Bayes Transition Graphs, meaning learning dependences between two time slices (t and t+1) which express two different relations: intra-temporal - - dependences among random variables of time slice t+1 - and inter-temporal - - dependence among random variables of time slice t and of time slice t+1 To escape local maximum, besides the random restarts, a TABU list is used to prevent the revisiting of a recently seen graph.
BayesDyn(int[][], String, String[], int) - Constructor for class bayes.BayesDyn
Creates a new BayesDyn object which initializes a TABU list, the training data to be used the configurations of the random variables given in the training set, the number of random variables, a new BayesTransitionNetwork object, the names of the random variables and a new Score object
BayesGraph - Interface in bayes
Interface which extends the Graph interface and represents a bayesian graph.
BayesianNetwork - Interface in bayes
Interface that represents a Bayesian Network.
BayesStatic - Class in bayes
Represents a Simple Bayesian Network (implements the BayesianNetwork interface) to be learned using Bayes Static Graphs, meaning learning dependences in the same time slice.
BayesStatic(int[][], String, String[], int) - Constructor for class bayes.BayesStatic
Creates a new BayesDyn object which initializes a TABU list, the training data to be used the configurations of the random variables given in the training set, the number of random variables, a new BayesTransitionNetwork object, the names of the random variables and a new Score object
BayesStaticGraph - Class in bayes
Represents a graph in a form of an adjacency list (extends AdjacencyList class) and also implements a BayesGraph Particularly it represents a static bayesian network which describes dependencies between random variables at a certain time interval
BayesStaticGraph(int) - Constructor for class bayes.BayesStaticGraph
Creates a new BayesStaticGraph object with a certain number of random variables representing it, and uses the default number of maximum parents
BayesStaticGraph(int, int) - Constructor for class bayes.BayesStaticGraph
Creates a new BayesStaticGraph object with a certain number of random variables representing it and a new number of maximum parents, other than the default
BayesTransitionGraph - Class in bayes
Represents a graph in a form of an adjacency list (extends AdjacencyList class) and also implements a BayesGraph.
BayesTransitionGraph(int) - Constructor for class bayes.BayesTransitionGraph
Creates a new BayesStaticGraph object with a certain number of random variables representing it, and uses the default number of maximum parents
BayesTransitionGraph(int, int) - Constructor for class bayes.BayesTransitionGraph
Creates a new BayesStaticGraph object with a certain number of random variables representing it and a new number of maximum parents, other than the default.
bestRemove() - Method in class bayes.BayesDyn
Computes all graphs obtained by removing an edge (representing intra and intra dependences) to the previous graph and stores the one with the best score.
bestRemove() - Method in class bayes.BayesStatic
Computes all graphs obtained by removing an edge to the previous graph and stores the one with the best score.
